data.name: 0000 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru and Kyon, and also your little sister!

data.name: 0001 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They say kids are good at sensing the supernatural, so I definitely want her involved!

data.name: 0002 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yeah, I'll do my best!

data.name: 0003 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't try too hard, little sister. Right now I'm desperate for a cover-up.

data.name: 0005 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, where should we start the investigation?

data.name: 0006 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, good question... Kyon, where do you think is best? Follow your intuition!

data.name: 0007 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you're searching for something spiritual, how about the old building?

data.name: 0008 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I say, trying to steer Haruhi away from the building where the 1st-year classrooms are.

data.name: 0009 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's stupid. Yuki and Koizumi are already over there gathering information.

data.name: 0010 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But I'm calling it now, the first year rooms in the main building are totally suspicious!

data.name: 0011 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Then don't ask my opinion—I'm pretty sure god would sympathize if I complained about it.

data.name: 0012 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, on that note, let's go.

data.name: 0013 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Unnatural phenomena will be in plain sight, I'm sure of it!

data.name: 0014 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeh, in plain sight?

data.name: 0015 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Look what you did. Asahina is completely frightened.

data.name: 0017 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Unnaaatural phenomenaaa, come out heree!

data.name: 0018 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahaha! Keep it up, little sister!

data.name: 0019 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Give me a break. No, seriously.

data.name: 0022 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The main building is huge. It'll be hard to check out the whole place, won't it?

data.name: 0023 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Little sister, where do you think would be suspicious?

data.name: 0024 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, stop treating my little sister as a radar for unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0025 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine isn't it?

data.name: 0026 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Mmm~, what about this room?

data.name: 0027 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Class 1-6, huh. Six is a nice number—it has that devil number feel.

data.name: 0028 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't get overly obsessed with those delusions—they'll probably become reality.

data.name: 0030 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It l-looks kinda dark and scary.

data.name: 0031 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Obviously—the lights aren't on. Let's hurry in. Come on, quickly.

data.name: 0032 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: EEEEeeeeh!?

data.name: 0033 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-it's darkk... Suzumiyaaa!

data.name: 0034 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The atmosphere is on point. It's a perfect fit for the birthplace of unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0036 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Huh? Something's moving?

data.name: 0037 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eek!? Wh-what is it!?

data.name: 0038 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I looked closer, something was gently swaying in the faint darkness…

data.name: 0039 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Where!?

data.name: 0041 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Look, over there. By the window!

data.name: 0042 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: By the window...?

data.name: 0043 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, what? It's just the curtain swaying.

data.name: 0045 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: C-curtain? Is that really it?

data.name: 0046 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina didn't even make any effort to look at the window, perhaps out of fear.

data.name: 0047 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She seems to have a hard time with this occult stuff.

data.name: 0048 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, it's true. Seems like the air through the slightly open window is causing them to sway.

data.name: 0049 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: The window... is open?

data.name: 0050 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's the work of a yokai! I'm sure of it! It's got to be one of those window-opening yokai!

data.name: 0051 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I've never heard of a window-opening yokai. Don't just say whatever pops in your mind.

data.name: 0052 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, I'm not very good with that kind of stuff... It's scary.

data.name: 0053 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I understand, but please don't worry—it's really just the curtain.

data.name: 0054 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank goodness…

data.name: 0055 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Being bad with the occult is very Asahina.

data.name: 0056 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It is without a doubt just the curtains but... there's still something strange about it.

data.name: 0057 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what's strange?!

data.name: 0058 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The window is slightly open. That allowed wind to blow in and shake the curtains…

data.name: 0059 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's strange that the window for a class no one uses is open during the summer holiday.

data.name: 0060 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So it is the work of a ghost, after all!

data.name: 0061 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eeeeeeeeehhhhhhh!?

data.name: 0062 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I know she's not being serious, but Asahina was frightened for real.

data.name: 0063 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's reflect on what you've done…

data.name: 0064 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Anyways, someone must've just forgotten to close the window before going home.

data.name: 0065 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even though it's summer vacation, there are still various club activities and summer classes.

data.name: 0066 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah... of course. That's right.

data.name: 0067 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Give me a break. It just being the curtain is way too disappointing to be fair.

data.name: 0068 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I had high hopes for it to be a hanged ghost or something.

data.name: 0069 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How could you even imagine something so nasty?

data.name: 0070 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's nothing strange about it. People talk about that kind of thing all the time.

data.name: 0071 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The stress of having gotten bad grades leading to hanging yourself in the classroom…

data.name: 0072 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They're left with a grudge and unable to rest in peace, so they haunt the school!

data.name: 0073 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SE003#SK0Suzumiya, please stop it!

data.name: 0074 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, that's enough. You're scaring Asahina.

data.name: 0075 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's rumored that nobody who sees their figure returns alive.

data.name: 0076 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then how is the rumor spreading? All the eyewitnesses should be dead.

data.name: 0078 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …That's what makes it unnatural phenomena, surely.

data.name: 0079 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once again, saying whatever comes to mind.

data.name: 0080 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is no good, there's nothing here but darkness.

data.name: 0081 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Let's look somewhere else.

data.name: 0082 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-there are other places we're going...?

data.name: 0083 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's only natural. Now then, little sister, tell us where we're going next.

data.name: 0085 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hmm… Let's see…

data.name: 0086 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just say you want to go home.

data.name: 0087 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: But I'm doing just fine?

data.name: 0088 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's a pity you can't pick up on your brother's true intentions, little sister.

data.name: 0089 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ah, right. How about the library?

data.name: 0090 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The library, huh… I see. Not a bad idea at all, it's right downstairs.

data.name: 0091 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright, then the library it is!

data.name: 0092 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You say that… but being the middle of summer vacation, it's bound to be locked.

data.name: 0093 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The staff room is on the same floor isn't it? We can just borrow the key from there.

data.name: 0094 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Good grief, I wish you'd put that vitality of yours towards something else.

data.name: 0095 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe on helping me with my summer homework or something—there's all sorts of options.

data.name: 0098 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We borrowed the key to the library exactly as Haruhi said, but…

data.name: 0099 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi.

data.name: 0100 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0101 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Be honest with me… How did you get the library key?

data.name: 0102 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I just told them I was going to borrow it, and did.

data.name: 0103 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: From who?

data.name: 0104 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Beats me. No one was there.

data.name: 0105 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's not what the general public would call getting permission.

data.name: 0106 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: T-this place is also dark.

data.name: 0107 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Should we turn on the lights? Where's the switch~?

data.name: 0108 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, it's hard to find the switch in here. Where was it again?

data.name: 0109 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon…

data.name: 0110 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Everything's okay, I'm right here beside you.

data.name: 0112 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even so, this darkness is seriously unsettling.

data.name: 0113 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So this is the creepiness of an empty school building huh…

data.name: 0114 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Kyyaaaa!?

data.name: 0115 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what's wrong?

data.name: 0116 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0J-just now, the window was rattling!

data.name: 0117 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's a poltergeist!

data.name: 0118 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: P-pole ter geist?

data.name: 0119 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was the grudge of an evil spirit that made it rattle.

data.name: 0120 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's just the wind, you know.

data.name: 0121 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You have no imagination. That's completely unacceptable as a member of our brigade!

data.name: 0122 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-it was the grudge of an evil spirit?

data.name: 0123 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I can say with certainty that it's not. I'll prove it to you once this summer camp ends.

data.name: 0124 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okayyy…

data.name: 0125 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She looks utterly terrified.

data.name: 0126 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Meanwhile, Haruhi has the nerve to cheerfully enjoy her little paranormal search.

data.name: 0127 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like I should do something about this.

data.name: 0128 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi...

data.name: 0129 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you scare Asahina too much it'll get in the way of the investigation.

data.name: 0130 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I know, but having a scaredy-cat with me makes me want to rise to their expectations.

data.name: 0131 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't think anyone's expecting anything of you…

data.name: 0132 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about you. Isn't there anything you're afraid of?

data.name: 0133 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Me? Of course there isn't—I'm the SOS Bridge Chief, you know?

data.name: 0134 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is there really nothing? You're certain?

data.name: 0135 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's nothing. I can assure you of that.

data.name: 0136 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Well, I suppose even when you saw that enormous "Celestial," you were relatively calm.

data.name: 0137 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When Koizumi showed me, it kinda spooked me a little…

data.name: 0138 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, you don't need to be afraid, so feel free to relax.

data.name: 0139 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm here, and Nagato and Koizumi are here at school too.

data.name: 0140 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: With those two around, there's no need to be worried about most things. It'll be okay.

data.name: 0141 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that's right—Nagato is also here, after all.

data.name: 0142 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As expected it seems that Nagato is the most reliable of the group.

data.name: 0143 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess it can't be helped.

data.name: 0146 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru! Behind you!

data.name: 0147 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeeeeep!?

data.name: 0148 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I lied, sorry!

data.name: 0149 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-y-y-you just tried to scare me again, right?

data.name: 0150 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: —!? Mikuru watch your step!

data.name: 0151 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eeeeeeeeeeeek!?

data.name: 0152 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Juuust kidding! It's honestly just because you're so cute, Mikuru.

data.name: 0153 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0P-pleeeease stop it!

data.name: 0154 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After all that to calm her down, she's gone right back to how she was.

data.name: 0155 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief…

data.name: 0157 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, it doesn't seem like any of the library books have a lead about class 1-10.

data.name: 0158 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It doesn't seem like spirits or any of those kinds of phenomena will show up either.

data.name: 0159 (372.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Sorry bout that, Haru-nyan.

data.name: 0160 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You didn't do anything wrong. It's the un- natural phenomena's fault for not showing up.

data.name: 0161 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right, let's keep exploring a bit longer. It's started to get a little fun.

data.name: 0163 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm getting sick of it.

data.name: 0164 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It would at least be good to let Asahina return to the clubroom.

data.name: 0165 (372.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina…

data.name: 0166 (372.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyaaaa!?

data.name: 0167 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's like this just from me calling out to her a little. She's absolutely terrified.

data.name: 0168 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You have my sympathy, Asahina…

data.name: 0169 (372.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Maybe we should head for the art room next! That place is very suspicious!

data.name: 0170 (372.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hey, give us a break... No seriously.

data.name: 0171 (372.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Reassure her

data.name: 0172 (372.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Scare her a little

data.name: 0173 (372.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Calm Haruhi

data.name: 0174 (372.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Comfort Mikuru
